title: Replay
body: Okay, so i replayed and recorded to make a highlight, then i watched the highlight but there was so sound to the highlight. Can anyone help me?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Most of the time if you have some kind of overlay running in the background it will cause no sound or even some ungodly screeching in the highlight. Double check that there aren't any background programs running that might interfere with the replay, and if need be try running a clean boot to make sure there isn't something still messing up that recording.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JmOieZZx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-03T00:41:14.960+0000)
>
> Most of the time if you have some kind of overlay running in the background it will cause no sound or even some ungodly screeching in the highlight. Double check that there aren't any background programs running that might interfere with the replay, and if need be try running a clean boot to make sure there isn't something still messing up that recording.

okay so i tried everything you said but the screeches are still there.

Straaaaange. Let's go ahead and get you some more in depth help. Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to walk you through a few steps to see if we can get that weird noise out of your replays.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JmOieZZx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-03T00:41:14.960+0000)
>
> Most of the time if you have some kind of overlay running in the background it will cause no sound or even some ungodly screeching in the highlight. Double check that there aren't any background programs running that might interfere with the replay, and if need be try running a clean boot to make sure there isn't something still messing up that recording.

Thanks so much!
